channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Silent Security Crisis In AI’s Code Gold Rush—And How To Fix It
item.description: The future belongs to those who wield AI’s power responsibly. Let’s build it—one secure line of code at a time.

item.title: Rethinking Threat Detection In A Decentralized World
item.description: Hybrid cloud complexity leaves security teams blind to lateral movement. Discover how AI security graphs enable real-time detection, context, and rapi...

item.title: HBO’s ‘Harry Potter’ Show Confirms Six Big Cast Members
item.description: Harry Potter has cast six actors in major roles for the upcoming HBO series, many known actors and a talented cast.

item.title: PlayStation 5 Price Increase: A Sign Of Things To Come?
item.description: With inflation biting and tariffs looming, Sony is reshaping its pricing strategy — offering a potential glimpse into Big Tech’s new economic reality.

item.title: Netflix’s Best New Show Nabs A Perfect 100% Critic Score
item.description: The best new show to hit Netflix in a while has arrived with perfect scores from critics, but it may not be for everyone.

item.title: How to win an argument with a toddler
item.description: You can’t. That’s because toddlers don’t understand what an argument is and aren’t interesting in having one. Toddlers (which includes defensive burea...

item.title: Charged by the word

item.title: The AI effort gap
item.description: It can take seven years to get a PhD. And a month to write a useful business plan or a year to write a book. And yet, when AI shows up, our mistake is...

item.title: Why and how

item.title: Designed, Designy or Well-designed?
item.description: If we create something with purpose, we’ve designed it. It’s not an accident. An axe handle is designed, and so is a symphony. Some things, though are...
